properties.name: ComputePlatform
properties.description: The destination platform type for the deployment (Lambda, Server, or ECS).

type.description: The destination platform type for the deployment (Lambda, Server, or ECS).

properties.name: DeploymentConfigName
properties.description: A name for the deployment configuration. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the deployment configuration name. For more information, see Name Type.

type.description: A name for the deployment configuration. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the deployment configuration name. For more information, see Name Type.

properties.name: MinimumHealthyHosts
properties.description: The minimum number of healthy instances that should be available at any time during the deployment. There are two parameters expected in the input: type and value.

type.description: The minimum number of healthy instances that should be available at any time during the deployment. There are two parameters expected in the input: type and value.

properties.name: TrafficRoutingConfig
properties.description: The configuration that specifies how the deployment traffic is routed.

type.description: The configuration that specifies how the deployment traffic is routed.
